trans-unit.source: Represents the container for multiple-document interface (MDI) child forms.
trans-unit.target: Representa el contenedor para formularios secundarios de interfaz de múltiples documentos (MDI).

trans-unit.source: You should not create an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MdiClient> control.
A form creates and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MdiClient> when you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Crea un formulario y se utiliza el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MdiClient> al establecer el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A> propiedad `true`.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MdiClient" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MdiClient" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MdiClient" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la imagen de fondo que se muestra en el control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MdiClient" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> that represents the image to display in the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> que representa la imagen que se va a mostrar en el fondo del control.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MdiClient.BackgroundImage%2A> property to get and set the background image of a form’s MDI client area.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MdiClient.BackgroundImage%2A> propiedad para obtener y establecer la imagen de fondo del área de cliente de un formulario MDI.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad no es relevante para esta clase.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad no es relevante para esta clase.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MdiLayout" /> values that defines the layout of MDI child forms.
trans-unit.target: Uno de los valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MdiLayout" /> que define la presentación de los formularios MDI secundarios.

trans-unit.source: Arranges the multiple-document interface (MDI) child forms within the MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: Organiza los formularios secundarios MDI (interfaz de múltiples documentos) dentro del formulario MDI principal.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.LayoutMdi%2A> method to arrange MDI child forms on a parent form.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.LayoutMdi%2A> método para organizar formularios MDI secundarios en un formulario de elemento primario.

trans-unit.source: Gets the child multiple-document interface (MDI) forms of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MdiClient" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene los formularios secundarios MDI (interfaz de múltiples documentos) del control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MdiClient" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> array that contains the child MDI forms of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MdiClient" />.
trans-unit.target: Una matriz <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> que contiene los formularios MDI secundarios del objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MdiClient" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiChildren%2A> property to get the child MDI forms of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MdiClient>.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiChildren%2A> propiedad que se va a obtener el elemento secundario formularios MDI de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MdiClient>.
